#2D219DE4:
1. Maximum daily Battle Stamina is 120 points. If you reached the daily battle stamina, you will not gain Exp and Drop.
2. You can activate Freya's Luck to get items from the monster while your Battle Stamins is exhausted.
3. Battle stamina will not be consumed while using Freya's Luck.

#4F835429:
1. Mercenaries can only level up through Mercenary Scrolls.
2. 1st mercenary slot is available upon first unlock. 2nd will be unlocked after completing the level 42 quest.
3. Mercenary level cannot exceed the owner's level.
4. When your mercenary reached Lv40, you can complete a job change quest and obtain a large stat bonus.
5. You can unlock higher equipment level, mercenary skills and improve stats through mercenary level up.
#D692A9AC:
1. You can acquire Trait Scrolls on daily events or using Zeny.
2. After reaching the required level, you can level up the deisred trait by consuming Trait Scroll. The higher the trait level, the better the effect and more Trait Scroll will be consumed.
3. You can change Trait Skill of the same level at any time by consuming Copper. Attribute levels are completely inherited.
When Trait Skill reached the max level, Trait Scrolls can be consumed for additional stats. The effect will last {0}hours.
